# vpsie_snapshot_policy (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vpsie_snapshot_policy" "example" {
  name        = "daily-snapshot"
  backup_plan = "daily"
  plan_every  = "1"
  keep        = "7"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `backup_plan` (String)
- `keep` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `plan_every` (String)

### Optional

- `vms` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `created_by` (String)
- `created_on` (String)
- `disabled` (Number)
- `identifier` (String)
